attacks.name: Tail Swipe
attacks.special: All Characters within 4" are targets of this attack. If a Critical Hit is made, the target Character is thrown D6 inches in a direction of the Dragon player's choosing. This Character is Prone.

attacks.name: Noxious Breath
attacks.special: 6" range. Requires a Medium Feat. Draw a line from this Character to the target. Any Character touched by this line is also affected by this Attack. In addition, the targets suffer a number of Hits equal to the amount of HP that they are below their starting HP.

attacks.name: Talons
attacks.special: If a Critical Hit is rolled, if the target Character is on a smaller base size they become Prone after the Attack has been made.

traits.name: Advanced Fungal Regeneration
traits.description: If this Character is not in base contact with an enemy Character at the end of an Activation, it regains D3 HP.
